name: Martial
description: Your start with 1 Focus Point and your FP increases as shown in the Barbarian Class Table. You also known Manuevers as shown in the table.

name: Melee Weapon Proficiency
description: You are Proficient with all Melee Weapons.

name: Simple Ranged Proficiency
description: You are Proficient with Simple Ranged Weapons.

name: Light Armor Proficiency
description: You are Proficient with Light Armor and Light Shields.

name: Barbaric Focus
description: If you did not use FP on an Attack, you regain half of your FP when you score a Heavy or Critical Hit against a creatures. Additionally, if a Heavy or Critical Hit is scored against you, you also regain half of your FP.

name: Rage
description: You can spend 1 AP and 1 FP to enter Rage for 1 minute. For the duration, you have the following effects: \\n- You deal +1 damage on Melee Attacks.\\n- You have ADV on Might Checks and Saves.\\n- Your AC decreases by 2.\\n- You gain Resistance (x0.5) to Physical Damage.\\nYour Rage ends early if you fall Unconscious, die, or choose to end it.

name: Unarmored Warrior
description: - While not wearing Armor, your AC is: 8 + Proficiency + (Dexterity or Might) + 2\\n- While not wearing Armor, you have +1 Speed.

name: Mighty Leap
description: You can use your Might instead of Dexterity to determine your Jump Distance and the damage you take from Falling.
